hasAttributes.name: IBAN
hasAttributes.description: The International Bank Account Number.

hasAttributes.name: bankAccountId
hasAttributes.description: Unambiguous identification of the account to which credit and debit entries are made.

hasAttributes.name: bankAccountName
hasAttributes.description: Name of the bank account, e.g. 'NatWest Checking Account'.

hasAttributes.name: bankAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: The number allocated to the account by the individual's or company's own bank.

hasAttributes.name: bankAccountSubType
hasAttributes.description: Specifies the sub type of account (product family group).

hasAttributes.name: bankAccountType
hasAttributes.description: Specifies the type of account (personal or business).

hasAttributes.name: bankSortCode
hasAttributes.description: The bank sort code.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitDescription
hasAttributes.description: Business unit (plain language) description to indicate the name or other identifying characteristics of the business unit.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitHierarchy1
hasAttributes.description: If a hierarchy exists in the business unit structure, use the field to capture the highest level of the hierarchy, e.g. global area with values such as North America, South America, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, the Far East, etc.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitHierarchy2
hasAttributes.description: If a hierarchy exists in the business unit structure, use the field to capture the next lower level of the hierarchy, e.g. regions with values such as East Coast, West Coast, Central-Western Europe, etc.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitHierarchy3
hasAttributes.description: If a hierarchy exists in the business unit structure, use the field to capture the next lower level of the hierarchy, e.g. cities with values such as Los Angeles, Boston, Frankfurt, etc.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitHierarchy4
hasAttributes.description: If a hierarchy exists in the business unit structure, use the field to capture the next lower level of the hierarchy.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitHierarchy5
hasAttributes.description: If a hierarchy exists in the business unit structure, use the field to capture the next lower level of the hierarchy.

hasAttributes.name: legalEntityIdentifier
hasAttributes.description: Third party registration number given by local authorities / local regulators, e.g. company registration number.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: accountSubType
hasAttributes.description: Grouping for lower-level categories on the financial statements, e.g. Current Asset, Current Liabilities, Cost of Sales, etc.

hasAttributes.name: accountType
hasAttributes.description: Grouping for high-level category on the financial statements. Values should be assets, liabilities, equity, revenue, expenses, etc.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: chartOfAccountType
hasAttributes.description: Type of COA which can be either operational(standard), country or group(specific).

hasAttributes.name: consolidationGroupChartOfAccounts
hasAttributes.description: Whether the GL to be assigned to group chart of accounts.

hasAttributes.name: controllingIntegration
hasAttributes.description: How postings can be made to account code, e.g. manual or automatic entries.

hasAttributes.name: fsCaption
hasAttributes.description: Financial statement caption. Grouping for the caption the GL account rolls up to on the financial statements, e.g. cash and cash equivalents, accounts payable, cost of sales, etc. Sometimes may prefer to be at the trial balance level.

hasAttributes.name: glAccountDescription
hasAttributes.description: Label or description associated with glAccountNumber.

hasAttributes.name: glAccountName
hasAttributes.description: Name for the GL account.

hasAttributes.name: glAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: Identifier for the GL account. glAccountNumber in this file must match the glAccountNumber used in the glDetails and trialBalance.

hasAttributes.name: parentGlAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: A reference to the glAccountNumber that is the parent in an account hierarchy. Provided to allow more than the predefined levels of hierarchy in the chart of accounts table.

hasAttributes.name: segment01
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment02
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment03
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment04
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment05
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: amount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the functional currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all transactions should be recorded in a single currency. Must be absolute.

hasAttributes.name: amountCreditDebitIndicator
hasAttributes.description: Indicates whether the amount is a credit or debit. 'C'=credit; 'D'=debit.

hasAttributes.name: amountCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the functional currency of the entity, e.g. EUR for Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: approvedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who approved the entry.

hasAttributes.name: approvedDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date and time the entry was approved.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: clearingDate
hasAttributes.description: The date on which the transaction was cleared.

hasAttributes.name: clearingDocumentNumber
hasAttributes.description: Document number of the cleaning document.

hasAttributes.name: customerId
hasAttributes.description: Unique code for the customer. Must match customerId per the customerMasterData.

hasAttributes.name: documentDate
hasAttributes.description: The date of the supporting document which forms the basis of the record e.g. supply invoice, credit note, etc.

hasAttributes.name: documentStatus
hasAttributes.description: Status of the transaction document, e.g. "Posted" or "Unposted".

hasAttributes.name: documentType
hasAttributes.description: Type of document which forms the basis of the record, e.g. supply invoice, credit note, etc.

hasAttributes.name: effectiveDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the transaction is effective.

hasAttributes.name: enteredBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for person who created the record.

hasAttributes.name: enteredDateTime
hasAttributes.description: The date the transaction was entered into the system. This is sometimes referred to as the creation date. This should be a system-generated date (rather than user-entered date), when possible. This date does not necessarily correspond with the date of the transaction itself.

hasAttributes.name: fiscalYear
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal year in which effectiveDate occurs

hasAttributes.name: glAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: Identifier for the account to which the transaction was posted. glAccountNumber in this file must match the glAccountNumber used in the trialBalance and chartOfAccounts

hasAttributes.name: isClearing
hasAttributes.description: TRUE/FALSE field indicating whether the transaction is a clearing transaction.

hasAttributes.name: isInterCoFlag
hasAttributes.description: TRUE/FALSE field indicating whether the transaction is intercompany.

hasAttributes.name: isNegativePostingIndicator
hasAttributes.description: TRUE/FALSE field indicating whether the transaction is a negative posting.

hasAttributes.name: jeHeaderDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of the entire journal entry as described by the journal entry header.

hasAttributes.name: jeLineDescription
hasAttributes.description: Description of the individual line within the journal entry.

hasAttributes.name: journalEntryType
hasAttributes.description: Types of journal entry recorded in the GL, e.g. Opening Entries, Transfer Entries, Closing Entries, Adjusting Entries, Compound Entries, and Reversing Entries.

hasAttributes.name: journalId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier that is unique for each journal entry. May require concatenation of multiple fields.

hasAttributes.name: journalIdLineNumber
hasAttributes.description: Identifier that is unique for each line within a journal entry.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedBy
hasAttributes.description: userId (from userListing) for the last person modifying this entry.

hasAttributes.name: lastModifiedDate
hasAttributes.description: The date the entry was last modified before posting.

hasAttributes.name: localAmount
hasAttributes.description: Amount of the transaction in the local (foreign) currency.

hasAttributes.name: localAmountCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: period
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal period in which the effectiveDate occurs, e.g. W1-W53 for weekly periods, M1-M12 for monthly periods, and Q1-Q4 for quarterly periods.

hasAttributes.name: postingKey
hasAttributes.description: Key identifying posting status or other posting information about the transaction.

hasAttributes.name: referenceSubledgerDocumentNumber
hasAttributes.description: Reference number associated with the subledger document which forms the basis of the record.

hasAttributes.name: referenceTransaction
hasAttributes.description: Reference number associated with other transaction related to the selected transaction, e.g. transactionId for sale transaction associated with a payment transaction.

hasAttributes.name: reportingAmount
hasAttributes.description: Transaction monetary amount recorded in the reporting currency.

hasAttributes.name: reportingAmountCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 for the currency in which a reporting entity prepares its financial statements, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: reversalFiscalYear
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal year in which the reversal is effective.

hasAttributes.name: reversalIndicator
hasAttributes.description: Indicates whether this entry is a reversal.

hasAttributes.name: reversalJournalId
hasAttributes.description: This identifies the journalId of the entry being reversed.

hasAttributes.name: reversalReason
hasAttributes.description: Reason for reversing the transaction.

hasAttributes.name: reversalType
hasAttributes.description: Code or name for the type of reversal, e.g. error, clearing, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment01
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment02
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment03
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment04
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment05
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: sourceId
hasAttributes.description: Posting source: code for source from which the journal entry originated, e.g. sales journal, cash receipts journal, general journal, payroll journal, accountant manual entry, spreadsheet, etc.

hasAttributes.name: supplierId
hasAttributes.description: Identifier of the supplier to whom payment is due. Must match the supplierId in the supplierMasterData.

hasAttributes.name: tags
hasAttributes.description: Internal flags used to 'tag' GL transactions as belonging to specific categories.

hasAttributes.name: taxCode
hasAttributes.description: Code used to identify taxes relevant to the transaction.

hasAttributes.name: transactionId
hasAttributes.description: Cross-reference to GL posting. It can contain many different levels to identify the transaction. It could include cost centres such as company, division, region, group, branch, department, etc.

hasAttributes.name: transactionType
hasAttributes.description: Code or name for the type of transaction e.g. AP, AR, Fixed Asset Purchase, Credit Note, etc.

hasAttributes.name: transactionTypeDescription
hasAttributes.description: Longer-form description for the type of transaction.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: segment0XDescription
hasAttributes.description: Segment description to indicate the name of Segment 0X.

hasAttributes.name: segment0XValue
hasAttributes.description: Value of Segment0X (X may equal 1 to 5).

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: businessProcessMajor
hasAttributes.description: The major class of transaction associated with a business process, e.g. sales.

hasAttributes.name: businessProcessMinor
hasAttributes.description: A subprocess of the major business process, e.g. orders, returns, discounts, etc.

hasAttributes.name: erpSubledgerModule
hasAttributes.description: Description of the subledger or ERP module the journal entry originated from. Should tie back to a system or significant accounting process. In some instances, may be represented by source.

hasAttributes.name: sourceDescription
hasAttributes.description: A plain language description of the source. Some of the more common journals are purchases, sales, cash receipts, cash disbursements, and general journal.

hasAttributes.name: sourceId
hasAttributes.description: Posting source: code for source from which the journal entry originated, e.g. sales journal, cash receipts journal, general journal, payroll journal, accountant manual entry, spreadsheet, etc.

hasAttributes.name: systemManualIdentifier
hasAttributes.description: Define if the source creates system-generated or manually entered journal entries. Provide an "S" or "M" for the value.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: regulatorActiveFlag
hasAttributes.description: True (Active) or False (Inactive).

hasAttributes.name: regulatorCode
hasAttributes.description: A code used to refer to this regulator or jurisdiction; used as key or cross-reference in files.

hasAttributes.name: regulatorCountry
hasAttributes.description: Two-letter country code according to ISO 3166-1 alpha 2 standard, e.g. NL for the Netherlands.

hasAttributes.name: regulatorDefaultAccrualGlAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account used to reflect accruals due to regulator.

hasAttributes.name: regulatorDefaultExpenseGlAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account used to reflect the tax expenses incurred.

hasAttributes.name: regulatorDefaultPayableGlAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: GL account used to reflect taxes due to regulator.

hasAttributes.name: regulatorIdentifier
hasAttributes.description: Tax or other code assigned by regulator for reporting organization to regulator.

hasAttributes.name: regulatorName
hasAttributes.description: Name of regulator for whom tax is withheld or accrued.

hasAttributes.name: regulatorRegion
hasAttributes.description: Sub-region within country; in the USA, this would be state; in Canada it would be province.

hasAttributes.name: regulatorReportingOrganization
hasAttributes.description: Organisation to which the regulator reports

hasAttributes.name: regulatorRole
hasAttributes.description: From: Federal, Regional, Local.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: amountBeginning
hasAttributes.description: Period beginning balance amount (that is, the ending balance from the prior period) recorded in the functional or group currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all are recorded in a single currency.

hasAttributes.name: amountBeginningLocal
hasAttributes.description: Period beginning balance amount in the local country currency for multicurrency tracking.

hasAttributes.name: amountBeginningReporting
hasAttributes.description: Period beginning balance amount in reporting currency used for statutory reporting.

hasAttributes.name: amountCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the functional currency of the entity, e.g. EUR for Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: amountEnding
hasAttributes.description: Period ending balance amount recorded in the functional or group currency. No multicurrency translation should need to be performed on this amount because all are recorded in a single currency.

hasAttributes.name: amountEndingLocal
hasAttributes.description: Period ending balance amount in the local country currency for multicurrency tracking.

hasAttributes.name: amountEndingReporting
hasAttributes.description: Period ending balance amount in reporting currency used for statutory reporting.

hasAttributes.name: amountLocalCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 standard for the local (foreign) currency, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: amountReportingCurrency
hasAttributes.description: Three-letter currency code according to ISO 4217 for the currency in which a reporting entity prepares its financial statements, e.g. EUR for the Euros or USD for American Dollars.

hasAttributes.name: balanceAsOfDate
hasAttributes.description: The date of the provided balance, not when the trialBalance file was created, e.g. 20141231 if year-end balance, even if the report was run on 20150122.

hasAttributes.name: businessUnitCode
hasAttributes.description: Used to identify the business unit, region, branch, etc. at the level that financial statements are being audited and for which the trial balance is generated. For example, you may use a code aligned with the concept of a reportable segment as defined in FASB Accounting Standards Codification (ASC) 280, Segment Reporting.

hasAttributes.name: fiscalYear
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal year for the BalanceAsOfDate

hasAttributes.name: glAccountName
hasAttributes.description: Name for the GL account.

hasAttributes.name: glAccountNumber
hasAttributes.description: Identifier for the GL account. glAccountNumber in this file must match the glAccountNumber used in the glDetails and chartOfAccounts

hasAttributes.name: period
hasAttributes.description: Fiscal period of the BalanceAsOfDate, e.g. W1-W53 for weekly periods, M1-M12 for monthly periods, and Q1-Q4 for quarterly periods.

hasAttributes.name: segment01
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment02
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment03
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment04
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: segment05
hasAttributes.description: Reserved segment field that can be used for profit centre, division, fund, program, branch, project, etc.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined1
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.

hasAttributes.name: userDefined2
hasAttributes.description: Having a function or role that is defined and gets varied from user to user.
